description: ff 10. 215 x 140; 165 x 65 mm. 17 lin. 18th cen. (autograph?). Dedicated to shaykh al-Islām Durrīzāde Muṣṭafá Efendi (d. 1175 H.: Tahir, Osmanlı müʻellifleri (1914-24), I, 308). Incip.: ... کىف لا احمد لمن مىز بفصول دقائق المعارف اهل الاذعان
author: Qiyāsī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh, 18th cent
title: Risālah fī al-isrāʼ.
creator: Qiyāsī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh, 18th cent
subject: Muḥammad, Prophet, d. 632—Isrāʼ and Miʻrāj—Early works to 1800
